doc.title: Hello
doc.author: Anupam
doc.body:
Rain feels awesome

It's been raining almost continuously since yesterday. And it's quite a change in the weather. Although I like the sunny day in Los Angeles, the rainy weather is a welcome change.

My weather app - breez , predicts that LA will recieve rain for another day.

The greatest Stunt in GTA5

I like to follow people who play video games and I found this gem on reddit.com

Digging around I found that the creators of this video is made by folks at Rooster Teeth, who were one of the first production studio to produce Machinama, before Machinama was even a thing.
